description:
Current snapshot-based metrics that show near real‑time data for the account.
Provides analytics that are similar to the Topology page for the account.
name: accountSnapshot

siteIDs.description: List of Unique Site Identifiers. If specified, only sites in list will be returned
siteIDs.name: siteIDs

userIDs.description: request specific IDs, regardless of if connected or not
userIDs.name: userIDs

sites___siteIDs.description: List of Unique Site Identifiers. If specified, only sites in list will be returned
sites___siteIDs.name: siteIDs

sites.description: Sites includes information about online as well as offline sites
sites.name: sites

connectedSince.description: For connected sites, since when are they connected
connectedSince.name: connectedSince

devices.description: Data related to the Sockets for a site
devices.name: devices

connected.description: A boolean value that indicates if the site is connected to the Cato Cloud
connected.name: connected

connectedSince.description: For connected devices (this somewhat overlaps to last duration)
connectedSince.name: connectedSince

haRole.description: Shows if this is the primary or secondary Socket in high availability mode
haRole.name: haRole

id.description: Unique internal Cato ID for the Socket
id.name: id

interfaces.description: Snapshot data for outbound facing interfaces
interfaces.name: interfaces

apn.description: Represents the Access Point Name (e.g., uwap.orange.co.il). Configurable from Socket WebUI or SIM switch.
apn.name: apn

apnSelectionMethod.description: Determines how the APN is selected. Valid values are Auto or Manual (configurable in WebUI).
apnSelectionMethod.name: apnSelectionMethod

disconnectionReason.description: Displays the reason for the modem disconnecting. Valid values are 0 (No reason provided) or 1 (The session timed out).
disconnectionReason.name: disconnectionReason

iccid.description: Unique identifier (20-digit number) for the modem.
iccid.name: iccid

imei.description: Unique identifier (15-digit number) for a specific SIM.
imei.name: imei

isModemConnected.description: Indicates if the cellular modem is currently connected to the internet.
isModemConnected.name: isModemConnected

isModemSuspended.description: Indicates if the modem is currently suspended.
isModemSuspended.name: isModemSuspended

isSimSlot1Detected.description: Indicates whether a SIM is detected in the first slot.
isSimSlot1Detected.name: isSimSlot1Detected

isSimSlot2Detected.description: Indicates whether a SIM is detected in the second slot.
isSimSlot2Detected.name: isSimSlot2Detected

modemStatus.description: Represents the current status of the modem. Valid values are Error, OK, or Unknown.
modemStatus.name: modemStatus

operatorName.description: Displays the operator or carrier name, such as Verizon.
operatorName.name: operatorName

signalStrength.description: Represents the signal strength of the cellular connection, in units of calculation.
signalStrength.name: signalStrength

simNumber.description: The phone number associated with the SIM.
simNumber.name: simNumber

simSlotId.description: Shows the currently active SIM slot; the other slot is in standby. Slot 1 is active by default.
simSlotId.name: simSlotId

connected.description: Shows if the WAN link is connected to the PoP
connected.name: connected

id.description: Interface ID for the WAN link
id.name: id

info.description: data about the WAN link that is configured in the Socket Configuration window for the site
info.name: info

destType.description: The destination type configured to the Socket interface
destType.name: destType

downstreamBandwidth.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth for traffic on this port, from the Cato Cloud to the site
downstreamBandwidth.name: downstreamBandwidth

downstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth for traffic on this port in MBPS with single decimal point, from the Cato Cloud to the site
downstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.name: downstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision

id.description: ID for the Socket port in the Socket WebUI Monitor tab
id.name: id

name.description: Name for the port in the Cato Management Application
name.name: name

upstreamBandwidth.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth on this port, for traffic from the site to the Cato Cloud
upstreamBandwidth.name: upstreamBandwidth

upstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.description: Maximum allowed bandwidth on this port in MBPS with single decimal point, for traffic from the site to the Cato Cloud
upstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision.name: upstreamBandwidthMbpsPrecision

name.description: WAN link name in the Cato Management Application
name.name: name

naturalOrder.description: Interface Natural order for WAN link
naturalOrder.name: naturalOrder

physicalPort.description: Physical WAN port on the Socket
physicalPort.name: physicalPort

popName.description: The name of the PoP that the WAN link is connected to
popName.name: popName

previousPopID.description: The ID of the PoP that the WAN link was connected to before the current one
previousPopID.name: previousPopID

previousPopName.description: The name of the PoP that the WAN link was connected to before the current one
previousPopName.name: previousPopName

tunnelConnectionReason.description: Reason that the tunnel required a new connection (for example, PoP or Socket restarted)
tunnelConnectionReason.name: tunnelConnectionReason

tunnelRemoteIP.description: IP address of the WAN ISP
tunnelRemoteIP.name: tunnelRemoteIP

tunnelRemoteIPInfo.description: IP address, ISP, and geographical information related to the WAN ISP
tunnelRemoteIPInfo.name: tunnelRemoteIPInfo

definition.description: A general structure to contain IP detailed information
definition.name: IPInfo

tunnelUptime.description: Number of seconds that the tunnel is connected to a PoP
tunnelUptime.name: tunnelUptime

interfacesLinkState.description:
Information of the link state of various interfaces in the devices. Unlike the `interfacess` field, it contains
   all links of the device, not just the outbound facing ones
interfacesLinkState.name: interfacesLinkState

duplex.description: Shows the duplex mode for the link
duplex.name: duplex

hasAddress.description: Indicates if the WAN interface has an IP address
hasAddress.name: hasAddress

hasInternet.description: Indicates if the interface is connected to the Internet
hasInternet.name: hasInternet

hasTunnel.description: Indicates if a connection has been established with the Cato Cloud
hasTunnel.name: hasTunnel

id.description: The ID for the specific Socket port, for example LAN1 or LAN2
id.name: id

linkSpeed.description: Shows the maximum bandwidth configured for the link
linkSpeed.name: linkSpeed

mediaIn.description: Indicates if there is a physical connection to the port
mediaIn.name: mediaIn

up.description: When this boolean value is true, then the link for the port is up
up.name: up

internalIP.description: Device's internal IP in the account's routing table
internalIP.name: internalIP

lastConnected.description: The last time the device was seen
lastConnected.name: lastConnected

lastDuration.description: The uptime of the last tunnel from this device (or current), in seconds
lastDuration.name: lastDuration

lastPopID.description: The ID of the PoP that the Socket is connected to
lastPopID.name: lastPopID

lastPopName.description: The PoP name that the Socket is connected to
lastPopName.name: lastPopName

mfaCreationTime.description: The time the mfa cookie (for sdp users) was created
mfaCreationTime.name: mfaCreationTime

mfaExpirationTime.description: Shows the amount of time remaining before the MFA token expires
mfaExpirationTime.name: mfaExpirationTime

osVersion.description: Version of the Socket operating system
osVersion.name: osVersion

recentConnections.description: Data related to the most recent completed traffic flows
recentConnections.name: recentConnections

interfaceName.name: interfaceName

lastConnected.description: The last time this connection was detected (so lastConnected - duration is the start of the connection
lastConnected.name: lastConnected

popName.description: The name of the PoP that the traffic flow was connected to
popName.name: popName

remoteIP.description: IP address the ISP allocates to the WAN link
remoteIP.name: remoteIP

remoteIPInfo.name: remoteIPInfo

definition.name: IPInfo

releaseGroup.name: releaseGroup

socketInfo.name: socketInfo

isPrimary.name: isPrimary

address.name: address

cityName.description: City of the physical site location

connType.description: The Connection Type field defines how the site connects to the Cato Cloud, such as X1500 Socket or AWS vSocket (array with nested fields)
connType.name: connType

creationTime.name: creationTime
